comment: Welcome to , where we have a news story every ten minutes ! Be sure to submit your related questions and replies to this thread ( for easier visibility ) with the hashtag <URL>

                        :ARG3 t2
                        :mod (t3 / this))
                  :purpose (v / visibility

                  :instrument (h3 / hashtag

comment: Our first question today comes from who wants to know how long you have been championing Made in Britain ! Submit your answers ( and any photos ) to this thread and dont forget to include in your tweets ! <URL>

                        :value 1)

                                          :ARG0 (y / you)
                                          :ARG1 (m2 / make-01
                                                :location (c3 / country
                                                      :name (n / name
                                                            :op1 "Britain")))))))))
      :snt2 (a / and
            :op1 (s / submit-01
                  :mode imperative

            :op2 (f / forget-01

                  :polarity -
                  :ARG0 y
